message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even at this price point.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Can you meet me at this price?
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your position, but $7,000 is too low for me. Could you consider $10,000?  I'm willing to negotiate to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $10,000 is too high. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8,500. Can you consider that?
